task.summary: Added the Diplomacy Engine API. Reimplemented the Systems and Tax script using that API. Probably solved a bug in the Tax script recurrent tax task after a savefile load.

New, oxp dev func: delivered DiplomacyEngineAPI for oxp developers, provided a dedicated readme file. New, doc: provided a dedicated file DiplomacyRoadmap.txt
Improvement, code consistency: the Systems and Tax js script now use the API rather than the native engine calls. Improvement, speed: optimized the loops in the engine Improvement, speed: one action per 20 frames
Bugfix: the init action using the api wasn't working after a restore from the savefile. Cleaning: log cleaning, file cleaning.

New, oxp dev func: delivered DiplomacyEngineAPI for oxp developers, provided a dedicated readme file. New, doc: provided a dedicated file DiplomacyRoadmap.txt
Improvement, code consistency: the Systems and Tax js script now use the API rather than the native engine calls. Improvement, speed: optimized the loops in the engine Improvement, speed: one action per 20 frames
Bugfix: the init action using the api wasn't working after a restore from the savefile. Cleaning: log cleaning, file cleaning.
Major refactor to remove dereferences, and increase the performance of the bottleneck: the save serialization.
Major refactor to remove dereferences, and increase the performance of the bottleneck: the save serialization.

Introduced the AlliancesEngine, allows to set scores on relations between actors. Relations between systems are scored, currently based on their government. A F4 interface displays the Strategic Map showing the relations between governments. The government is now stored into our system actor.

Two systems within 7ly of each other may now form an alliance, depending on their relation quality. Currently, each must have a score for the other of at least +0.5. Some Snooper news are now displayed when an alliance is formed between two systems, and the player is within 7ly of one of the allied systems. Events system enabled.
This oxp requires now Snoopers oxp.
Response to JOIN event is now initialized only once.
News are now stored in case of unavailability of snoopers engine. Stored news are displayed when the player changes screen, or another news has been displayed. Added FIXMEs.
Used a system name instead of its id the news message.
- We manage the Snoopers return code 30 - We act on the missionScreenOpportunity event - Removed the debug code - Bugfixes

- Alliance engine API is now available, and used instead of direct access to the alliance engine. - Reorganized functions in the scripts to make them more readable. Function's comments are now inside the functions. - Scoring functions are now orderable and ordered. - The JOIN event representing an alliance is renamed ALLY for consistency. - Alliances may now be broken; the related event is BREAK. Snoopers news are issued. - The alliance threshold used to ally and break alliances is now settable through the Alliance API. - Added a part on game performance in the readme.

0.10 Improvement, flavor: added a F4 System history, showing the F7-selected system events history. The displayed text depends on a formatting function definable through API per event. Improvement, flavor: the alliance and alliance break events are now displayed in the history. Improvement, dev func: the EngineAPI provides the events, and the events by actor. Improvement, dev func: the EngineAPI allows now to store a variable in the saved state with the other saved variables of the oxp. Improvement, dev func: introduced a Systems API and a History API. The systems API provides the system actors indexed by galaxyID and systemID.
Bugfix: manifest.plist for the oxz manager, using oxz from the sourceforge repository rather than from the old owncloud repository.

Some Snooper news are now displayed when an alliance is formed between two systems, and the player is within 7ly of one of the allied systems. Events system enabled.

News are now stored in case of unavailability of snoopers engine. Stored news are displayed when the player changes screen, or another news has been displayed. Added FIXMEs.
Used a system name instead of its id the news message.
